articles.title: Spokesman for KPA Southwestern Front Command Warns S. Korean Military Not to Forget Its Bitter Defeat in Yonphyong Shelling
articles.content:
Spokesman for KPA Southwestern Front Command Warns S. Korean Military Not to Forget Its Bitter Defeat in Yonphyong Shelling
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the command of the southwestern front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued the following statement on Sunday in connection with the fact that the south Korean military warmongers are running high fever in their sinister military provocation, oblivious of a lesson drawn from Yonphyong Island shelling incident five years ago.
					 As well known, Yonphyong Island shelling incident that happened on Nov. 23, 2010 was recorded as an event to be specially recorded in history of the north-south relations as it clearly proved once again how miserable the doom of those hell-bent on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen is.
					
					 However, the south Korean military is still resorting to the childish farce to mislead the public opinion and make a mockery of the world.
					
					 They are planning to conduct a provocative firing at the waters of the DPRK with the military hardware such as K-9, 155 mm self-propelled howitzer, 130 mm multiple launch rocket system, ground-to-ground guided missile "Spike", helicopter gunship AH-1S and other lethal weapons involved in the area around Paekryong Island and Yonpyong Island on Nov. 23, far from drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat on Yonphyong Island five years ago.
					
					 Prior to this, they opened to public on Nov. 15 the news that the marine corps command is pushing ahead with a proposal for changing the official name of "Yonphyong Island shelling provocation" into "Yonphyong Island Shelling Battle".
					
					 The reason they said is that if they call it the "north's shelling provocation on Yonpyong Island", they can mislead the public opinion to give impression that the KPA is the "real provocateur" but it would be hard for them to evade the world criticism that they sustained unilateral heavy blows and thus unable to erase their disgraceful record of defeat. So, they are planning to rename it the "shelling battle" and give impression that there was a close battle between the KPA and them in a bid to paint their defeat as a "victory".
					
					 The south Korean war-like military forces' act of renaming Yonphyong Island shelling incident is bringing another more serious misfortune to themselves.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is their remark that they would "raise the level of the honorable treatment" to the dead and the wounded of Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a sinister intention.
					
					 Their deplorable plight still suffering from persecution mania they caught in the face of strong firepower strike by the KPA is spreading war-weariness and evasion of military service among young and middle-aged south Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean military, being panic-stricken, is finding a way of putting the situation under control, and it seeks to tempt the soldiers to military service and encourage them to stand in the van of the confrontation with the compatriots in the north by "leveling up honorable treatment" to this end.
					
					 Herein lies the real purpose of the authorities' renaming.
					
					 The servicepersons of the Southwestern Front of the KPA take peace dearer than any others.
					
					 Therefore, they don't and will not have mercy on those who disturb peace even a little as they didn't in the past.
					
					 If the south Korean military fires at the waters of the DPRK in the hotspot area of the West Sea of Korea on Monday, they will experience merciless retaliation of the Southwestern Front units of the DPRK on the five islands.
					
					 The bellicose forces of the south Korean military should come to their senses.
					
					 They should go by the August agreement if it is truly dear to them.
					
					 They should not dig their own graves with war drumbeats for the preemptive strike against the DPRK but draw a lesson from the bitter defeat they suffered 5 years ago.
					
					 They would be well advised to remember that the provokers are always doomed.

articles.title: Party and Administrative Officials Visit Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Party and Administrative Officials Visit Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea and officials of the Cabinet, the ministries and national institutions visited the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory Sunday.
					 After laying bouquets before the mosaic "The great leaders Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il examining foodstuff for children", the visitors bowed to it.
					
					 After looking around the monument to field guidance by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, a room for the education in the revolutionary history and a room dedicated to the history of the factory, they toured the factory.
					
					 Watching various kinds of goods at dust-free and germ-free production sites where all the processes have been put on an automated and unmanned basis and food hygiene has been thoroughly ensured, they were convinced that local production intended by the party can certainly be realized.
					
					 They looked round modern and flawless sci-tech room and cultural and welfare facilities.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes S. Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes S. Hamgyong Province
 Hamhung, November 22 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard passed South Hamgyong Province.
					 They arrived at Tanchon City, South Hamgyong Province on Nov. 13.
					
					 Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, people from all walks of life and youths and students greeted them.
					
					 Members of the relay group of young vanguard in South Hamgyong Province who took over the red flag at the top of Machon Pass sped up their march. They visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City and the statues of Kim Il Sung in Sinpho City and Pukchong County and in Hungnam District, Hamhung City, the statue of Comrade Kim Hyong Gwon in Hongwon County and mosaics depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and images of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu to lay floral baskets and flowers and pay tribute to them.
					
					 They toured rooms for education in revolutionary history and production processes at the Tanchon Smeltery, the Tanchon Magnesia Factory and the Tanchon Mining Machine Factory and then had a meeting with young frontrankers in noble traits in Tanchon area.
					
					 After arriving in Hamhung City amid welcome by people including youths and students, they visited the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex and warmly congratulated the workers there.
					
					 They took part in the poem-recital and song-singing gathering of youths and students in Hamhung City and went round the Hamhung Knitwear Factory, Hamhung Woolen Mill and Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County.
					
					 They also went round the historic relics such as barked trees bearing slogans associated with the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who had been active in Sinhung area.
					
					 They had a bonfire meeting with youths and students in Jangjin County and evinced their pledge to work hard for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 During the march they held colorful political and cultural activities.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Om Yun Chol Sets New World Record
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Om Yun Chol Sets New World Record
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Om Yun Chol bagged a gold medal at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championship.
					 The championship opened in the U.S. on Nov. 20 brought together more than 600 weightlifters from 98 countries such as the DPRK, Russia, Kazakhstan, China and Japan.
					
					 Om jerked 171 kg in the 56kg category of men's weightlifting, setting a new world record on Nov. 21 and won the first place.
					
					 He snatched 131 kg and thus successfully lifted 302kg in total and won a gold medal.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Song Kum won the first place in the 48kg category of women's jerk.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blames S. Korean Conservative Authorities for Trying to Stamp out People's Consciousness of Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blames S. Korean Conservative Authorities for Trying to Stamp out People's Consciousness of Reunification
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- In south Korea education is being misused as a means for stamping out the people's consciousness of reunification through the alliance with the north, inciting hostility against the fellow countrymen and confrontational hysteria with them and dampening the spirit of independence and reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Sunday.
					
					 A row of introducing the "state-compiled history textbook" is an extremely anti-reunification and confrontational farce for inciting the distrust and hostility against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 "Left deviation of textbooks" is the pretext the south Korean conservative authorities cooked up to introduce the "state-compiled history textbook".
					
					 They have become vociferous, saying the textbooks "deal with the Juche idea and Songun politics" and use words such as the "Korean nation-first principle and independent line being pursued by the north" just as they are.
					
					 In a word, what they mean is that the junior and senior high school textbooks "praise the north" and defame south Korea.
					
					 The racket of introducing the "state-compiled history textbook" is an unprecedented history coup to check the efforts to make the society independent and democratic and carry on the disgraceful history of pro-U.S. and anti-reunification fascist dictatorship.
					
					 The "state-compiled history textbook" is an outdated remnant of the "yushin" dictatorial era. The south Korean chief executive is calculating that she can justify her dictatorial rule, completely dash people's dream and quell their desire for independence, democracy and reunification and keep the pro-U.S. and Japanese "government" for an indefinite period through the education of youths and children in the reactionary outlook on history and the world.
					
					 No matter how persistently the conservative authorities may resort to a racket for distorting history, they can never stamp out the people's high consciousness of reunification through the alliance with the north nor could they stop the massive struggle to make the society independent and democratic.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Warmongers Not to Forget Their Defeat on Yonphyong Island
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Warmongers Not to Forget Their Defeat on Yonphyong Island
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the marine corps command of the south Korean army submitted to the ministry of defense a proposal for changing the previous name of "Yonphyong Island shelling provocation" into "Yonphyong Island shelling battle".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that the south Korean warmongers' trick is a manifestation of their move for making a fresh armed provocation and reckless intention for invasion.
					
					 The commentary goes on;
					
					 They are now blustering if they rename the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, they will have an "effect of raising the morale of the army".
					
					 Their war-thirsty remarks are aimed at healing the aftereffects of the defeat on Yonphyong Island and injecting war hysteria into the officers and soldiers.
					
					 The south Korean authorities talk about the "punishment" at the "event" for marking the Yonphyong Island incident every November. Their purpose is to rid themselves of the feelings of disgrace and ignite a war of invading the north at any cost.
					
					 The south Korean military gangsters' foolish act is nothing but a last-ditch effort of the miserable guys running headlong, unaware of their doom.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate the foolish act of the south Korean military forces bringing the clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula in collusion with the foreign forces while chilling the climate of national reconciliation and unity and improvement of the north-south relations through reckless military provocation.
					
					 The provocateurs are doomed to miserable death and ruin.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers should not forget the lesson of their bitter defeat on Yonphyong Island not even a moment.

articles.title: Ruling Party Accused of Justifying Crackdown in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ruling Party Accused of Justifying Crackdown in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The North Kyongsang provincial alliance, Songju County peasants association and Koryong County peasants association under the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a press conference in Chilgok County, North Kyongsang Province on Nov. 17 in denunciation of the south Korean ruling party for justifying the fascist violence, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the conference speakers referred to the fact that Lee Wan Yong, an assemblyman from the "Saenuri Party", said it is reasonable that the policemen shot civilians to death in the U.S. and that the advanced countries should do like that.
					
					 His remarks are aimed at patronizing police who made Paek Nam Ki, a farmer, fall into a serious condition at an all-out people's action held around Kwanghwamun and Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on Nov. 14.
					
					 Speakers said that they can never tolerate the remarks of the assemblyman from the ruling party turning a deaf ear to the voices of the farmers for the rights to existence.
					
					 They stressed that all the farmers in North Kyongsang Province will certainly judge Lee Wan Yong and the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Introduction of "State-Compiled History Textbook" Opposed by S. Korean Teachers
articles.content:
Introduction of "State-Compiled History Textbook" Opposed by S. Korean Teachers
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Teachers under the National Teachers Union of south Korea are waging a struggle against the authorities' move for introducing the "state-compiled history textbook", according to the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News.
					 More than 1,500 teachers under the union held a rally in Kwanghwamun, Seoul on Nov. 20 urging the authorities to cancel the introduction of the "state-compiled history textbook" and halt the crackdown upon the trade unions.
					
					 That day each city and provincial branch of the union held meetings across the country and issued appeals denouncing the authorities' move for introducing the "state-compiled history textbook".

articles.title: Bulletin Issued by Guinean Body on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued by Guinean Body on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Guinean committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il issued a bulletin "The 4th anniversary of demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" on Nov. 16.
					 The bulletin introduced the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by developing the Juche idea, Songun idea into a guiding idea of the independent era and building the DPRK into an invincible socialist power strong in politics and ideology, military power and the country capable of manufacturing and launching the satellite and producing nuclear weapons.
					
					 The bulletin went on:
					
					 The Korean people are upholding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 They have made epochal changes by accelerating the drive to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was successfully launched in December, 2012, the Changjon Street and the People's Theatre were built in the centre of Pyongyang, the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, the Ryugyong Health Complex, the People's Open-air Ice Rink, the Pyongyang Folklore Park and the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital were built at top level at the initiative of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Many industrial establishments were renovated and the people's living standard was remarkably improved.
					
					 Public entertainment bases and medical service centers were built as a period of great prosperity in construction was ushered in.
					
					 Apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, Unha Scientists Street, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, Mirae Scientists Street and Sci-Tech Complex took up majestic shape and eye-opening achievements were brought about in the building of a highly civilized socialist country with the cities and villages across the country being spruced up into a socialist fairyland.

articles.title: British Personages Support Socialism in DPRK
articles.content:
British Personages Support Socialism in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- British personages, who took part in the celebrations for the October Socialist Revolution held in London, expressed full support and solidarity with the socialist cause in the DPRK which keeps holding high the banner of Juche.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said in a speech at a meeting on Nov. 14 that socialism failed in the former Soviet Union and East European countries but the socialist red flag was defended in the DPRK under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il made sure that Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" was adopted when the world socialist cause faced the greatest challenge, demonstrating the firm will to develop the socialist cause to the world.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, said: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung is a model internationalist.
					
					 He defended the Soviet Union with arms during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 The celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea in the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un were historic events that showed socialism is making steady victorious progress.
					
					 The world progressive forces have to turn out in the drive to support the socialist cause in the DPRK holding high the red flag.

articles.title: German Organization Denounces U.S.
articles.content:
German Organization Denounces U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on November 16 to condemn the U.S. for evading the proposal of the DPRK to sign a peace treaty.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. did not hope the conclusion of the peace treaty with the DPRK originally. Because the conclusion would make it impossible to justify its military edge in Asia and the encircling net and pressure on the countries around the Korean peninsula would end in failure.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes the peaceful solution of the issues concerning the peninsula and the world, it should stop the development and modernization of nuclear weapons and their proliferation to different countries first of all and completely dismantle its nuclear weapons, to begin with.
					
					 It is a lesson of history that the U.S. imperialists reduce any agreements to empty papers without hesitation to maintain its power, make economic profits and realize the world domination ambition in disregard of international conventions and law.

articles.title: British Organization Denounces U.S. Ambition
articles.content:
British Organization Denounces U.S. Ambition
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article titled "Let's remove the source of war" on its website on November 9.
					 The article said:
					
					 37 years ago the U.S. formed the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" to perpetuate its military presence and rule over south Korea and realize its ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. aggression forces which set up fascist dictatorship regimes, backed them with the armed forces, instigated the rulers to acts of treachery and suppression of people and are bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean nation while standing in the way of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" is the U.S. field machinery for an aggression war.
					
					 Today the U.S. imperialists' policy of maintaining their forces in south Korea and war provocations to invade the north have been further fostered by the south Korean authorities, a group of sycophantic traitors serving the U.S.
					
					 The war moves against the north of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers have assumed increasing bellicosity, and the situation on the Korean Peninsula has faced a grave phase again.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes peace and reunification on the peninsula, it should give up its policy of keeping its forces in south Korea and ambition to invade the north and abolish the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" without delay.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party Condemns U.S.
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party Condemns U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru released a statement titled "U.S. should not evade the conclusion of the peace treaty with the DPRK" on November 14.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has no qualifications to talk about the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is sophism distorting reality that the U.S. said the order was wrong as for the DPRK's demand for the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					 The DPRK proposed the U.S. the conclusion of the peace treaty several times in the past period and clarified once again its fair stand to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty at the 70th UN General Assembly.
					
					 The peace treaty is an issue to be surely concluded between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 It only shows the real intention of the U.S. that it tries to evade this under the groundless pretext.
					
					 The U.S. has no intent to conclude the peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 It should withdraw its hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Nigerian, Senegalese Media Praise Socialism in DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian, Senegalese Media Praise Socialism in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian website and Senegalese radio introduced the happy life of the Korean people under the socialist system on the occasion of Mother's Day in the DPRK. 
					 An article titled "Mothers in the DPRK" was posted on the website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Nov. 12.
					
					 The article introduced the virtues of Ryu Ok Hui bringing up dozens of orphans, Jang Jong Hwa being called a "girl mother" and Ri Pyong Hui who gave birth to many children to contribute to the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 A Senegalese radio broadcasted on Nov. 16 that the day marks Mother's Day in the DPRK and the mothers there receive special treatment. 
					
					 Mothers with several children had the privileges such as reduction in their work hours, and nurseries, kindergartens and hospitals help them work without inconvenience, the radio aired.
					
					 The DPRK is a popular country, the radio said, enumerating the advantages of socialism in the DPRK.
